titles.title: 014 Come Let Us All Unite to Sing

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Come let us all unite to sing
God is love! God is love!
While heav'n and earth Their praises bring
God is love! God is love!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Let ev'ry soul from Sin awake
Each in his heart sweet Music make
And sweetly sing For Jesus' sake
God is love! God is love!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
How happy is our Portion here
God is love! God is love!
His promises our Spirits cheer
God is love! God is love!

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
He is our sun and shield by day
Our help, our hope,
Our strength, and stay
He will be with us all the way
God is love! God is love!

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
In glory we shall sing again
God is love! God is love!
Yes, this shall be Our lofty strain
God is love! God is love!

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
While endless ages roll along
In concert with the Heav'nly throng
This shall be our Sweetest song
God is love! God is love!
